name: MTKView
desc: A specialized view that creates, configures, and displays Metal objects.

items.name: delegate
items.desc: The view’s delegate.

items.name: device
items.desc: The device object the view uses to create its Metal objects.

items.name: preferredDevice
items.desc: The device object that the system recommends using for this view.

items.name: colorPixelFormat
items.desc: The color pixel format for the current drawable’s texture.

items.name: colorspace
items.desc: The color space of the rendered content.

items.name: framebufferOnly
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the drawable’s textures are used only for rendering.

items.name: drawableSize
items.desc: The current size of drawable textures.

items.name: preferredDrawableSize
items.desc: The recommended dimensions of the drawable.

items.name: autoResizeDrawable
items.desc: A Boolean value that controls whether to resize the drawable as the view changes size.

items.name: clearColor
items.desc: The color to use to clear the color target when creating a render pass descriptor.

items.name: depthStencilPixelFormat
items.desc: The format used to generate the depthStencilTexture object.

items.name: depthStencilAttachmentTextureUsage
items.desc: The texture usage characteristics that the view uses when creating the depth and stencil textures.

items.name: clearDepth
items.desc: The depth value to use to clear the depth target when creating a render pass descriptor.

items.name: clearStencil
items.desc: The stencil value to use to clear the stencil target when creating a render pass descriptor.

items.name: sampleCount
items.desc: The sample count used to generate the multisampleColorTexture object.

items.name: multisampleColorAttachmentTextureUsage
items.desc: The texture usage characteristics that the view uses when creating multisample textures.

items.name: currentRenderPassDescriptor
items.desc: Creates a render pass descriptor to draw into the current drawable.

items.name: currentDrawable
items.desc: The drawable to use for the current frame.

items.name: depthStencilTexture
items.desc: A packed depth and stencil texture associated with the currentDrawable object’s texture.

items.name: multisampleColorTexture
items.desc: The multisample color sample texture to render into.

items.name: preferredFramesPerSecond
items.desc: The rate at which the view redraws its contents.

items.name: isPaused
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the draw loop is paused.

items.name: enableSetNeedsDisplay
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the view responds to setNeedsDisplay().

items.name: draw
items.desc: Redraws the view’s contents immediately.

items.name: presentsWithTransaction
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the view presents its content using a Core Animation transaction.

items.name: releaseDrawables
items.desc: Releases the depthStencilTexture and multisampleColorTexture objects.
